beer.name: Oatmeal Stout
beer.description: Saranac Oatmeal Stout is brewed with a delicate balance of the finest grown oats, selected hops, and our traditional ale yeast. Look for a sweet, dark chocolate and roasted taste.
beer.grains: 2 row, chocolate malt, roasted barley oats
2 row, chocolate malt, roasted barley oats
